attributes.text: Fired on change of the property {@link #state}.
Event when a request has timed out
Apply method for “state” property. For each state value a corresponding event is fired to inform the listeners.

Force the transport into the aborted state (“aborted”).

Listeners of the “aborted” signal are notified about the event.

Force the transport into the failed state (“failed”).

Listeners of the “failed” signal are notified about the event.

Returns the (computed) value of the property asynchronous.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #asynchronous}.

Returns the (computed) value of the property data.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #data}.

Returns the length of the content as fetched thus far.

This method is virtual and concrete subclasses are supposed to implement it.

Returns the request header of the request.

This method is virtual and concrete subclasses are supposed to implement it.

Provides an hash of all response headers.

This method is virtual and concrete subclasses are supposed to implement it.

Provides the response text from the request when available and null otherwise. By passing true as the “partial” parameter of this method, incomplete data will be made available to the caller.

This method is virtual and concrete subclasses are supposed to implement it.

Returns the (computed) value of the property responseType.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #responseType}.

Provides the XML provided by the response if any and null otherwise. By passing true as the “partial” parameter of this method, incomplete data will be made available to the caller.

This method is virtual and concrete subclasses are supposed to implement it.

Returns the (computed) value of the property state.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #state}.

Returns the current status code of the request if available or -1 if not.

This method is virtual and concrete subclasses are supposed to implement it.

Provides the status text for the current request if available and null otherwise.

This method is virtual and concrete subclasses are supposed to implement it.

Calls the apply method and dispatches the change event of the property asynchronous with the default value defined by the class developer. This function can only be called from the constructor of a class.
